name: Lower School
description: English and French immersion school with two cycles that together cover grades 1 - 6. The curriculum continues in both English and French in a way that makes learning exciting and challenging, while meeting the high standards of the U.S. and French educational systems.
fullDescription: English and French immersion school with two cycles that together cover grades 1 - 6. The curriculum continues in both English and French in a way that makes learning exciting and challenging, while meeting the high standards of the U.S. and French educational systems.
whatTheyOffer: English and French immersion school with two cycles that together cover grades 1 - 6. The curriculum continues in both English and French in a way that makes learning exciting and challenging, while meeting the high standards of the U.S. and French educational systems.
howToGetIt: Complete the application process by visiting their website admissions page.
cost: This is a fee based service.
